overview: Monique Alexander says she's been brutally violated, gagged and left for dead in a cold stone basement. Or was she? By wild luck, her ex-boyfriend hears her muffled cries and rescues her. Or does he? How did he know she was down there...naked, bleeding and violated? As this darkly sexual tale unfolds we are led to wonder...was she even hurt at all? If so, who is the culprit? The only thing we really know is that payback's a bitch. Literally.
title: Cry Wolf
